direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return a value related to the error code, but getName returns a human-readable name while getErrorCode returns the actual error code.
Both methods return a string that provides information about the error, but getName returns the attribute's name while getReasonPhrase returns a descriptive phrase.
Both methods involve setting or getting error-related information, but setErrorCode modifies the error code while getName retrieves the attribute's name.
Both methods involve setting or getting error-related information, but setReasonPhrase modifies the reason phrase while getName retrieves the attribute's name.
Both methods return a string related to the error, but getDefaultReasonPhrase returns a default reason phrase based on the error code while getName returns the attribute's name.
Both methods involve processing and returning data related to the error, but encode returns a binary representation while getName returns a human-readable name.
Both methods involve processing and setting data related to the error, but decodeAttributeBody processes a binary array while getName retrieves the attribute's name.
